title: What happens if we get dislike for our answer in Chegg? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you get dislike for your answer in chegg. Your CF score decreased but it doesn't affect your payment chegg pay you for each and every question.but you have to maintain good CF score 70- 80% other wise your account may be revoked for low CF score lasting 3 or 4 months. I suggest you don't break the chegg guidelines.

If u get dislike for your answer by the student your CF score decrease. That causes your quality marking negative .then u have to maintain your CF score more than or equal to 80% by which u always safe for your revocation account. I hope u understood….
